description:
As a user
    I want to access the dashboard page
    So that I can view my account information and data
name: InHouseWorkflow Page Functionality

elements.name: Create a ticket and download export

steps.name: I should navigate to application
I should Sign In into the application
Close the terms of service window
Click on Repair360 page
Click on InHouseRepairCenter tab
Filters of InHouseWorkflow should be visible
I should click on new button
Select failure Type, Serial Device, Technician and repair issue
Select building and Enter the Chromebook issue
Click on save button
Verify New Ticket is added
Enter Search ticket no in search box
Verify search result below

steps.name: Click on view button
Verify the Details of student repair ticket
Click on the Edit Ticket Button
Update the Technician and Repair Status
Click on Update Button
Verify Updated successfully
Click on Add Line and Verify
Click on Add Repair Image and Verify
Click on Add Note and Verify
